extendedInfo.description: Introducing the free Choice Hotels Android AppÂ® with instant access to 6,000+ hotels worldwide, so you can find and book a hotel room instantly on your phone - anytime, anywhere.The Choice Hotels Android App features cutting edge GPS technology to help you find the nearest Choice Hotels properties to any given location.Specifically designed for the Android Marketplace, the Choice Hotels Android App 1.0 allows you to find and book rooms using special rate IDs, contact customer care and provide feedback to the Android team that will be used to launch more updates, features and functionality in the months to come.Other highlights of the Choice Hotels Android App include:    â¢ Locate hotels by city, address, zip code, airport code or popular attraction    â¢ Photo gallery    â¢ Get hotel details and amenities    â¢ Choice PrivilegesÂ® account access    â¢ Call hotels directly or call 800.4CHOICE    â¢ Mapping FunctionalityAt Choice Hotels, we want to supply you with everything you need â wherever you are â with the best booking experience possible on your mobile device. Download the Android App today and hold your next great Choice Hotels experience in the palm of your hand!

reviews.title: Saves valuable time, when booking online, with RapidBook
reviews.comment: I have been using this App, since they first released it on Google Play, and with each update, they listen to their customers. They fix the bug with an update, and it gets more easy and fun to use with each new update. I only have one concern, and it can be easily fixed with a new update. And that is, to auto-fill in Credit card info from last booking, and put it into the boxes automatically, instead of using drop-down box, where info is already stored anyway. Just leave it auto-fill, once you log into account, as it does now with name, address, etc.  I book almost everyday, into a new hotel, as I travel and stay in hotels 300+ days a year.  Thank you
reviews.author: Tom Allen

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Good app, with one big exception. I often look for hotels offering the 1000 point bonus package. Sometimes there is no charge if the hotel is having trouble keeping rooms sold, sometimes there is a 5 dollar upcharge. Either way its cheaper than buying them for 10 dollars from choice privileges.  There is currently no way of viewing special rates other than the generic ones in the drop down menue. When this feature is added and my wife no longer must make my reservations from home I will up rating to 5
reviews.author: Roger Ames

reviews.title: Never has reserving a room been so easy.
reviews.comment: By downloading the application you can choose and book a room in seconds. You also can join their frequent users club and by entering their specials receive hundreds of dollars in free rooms and merchandise.
reviews.author: Thomas Patterson

reviews.comment: Good app, everything works but I have seen others that give you the trip advisor rating for the hotel you\'re looking at.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very reliable!!
reviews.comment: I travel 2 weeks a month without reservations bc I never know where I\'ll end up each night.  Choice tells me all the hotels within a 50 mile radius, pictures, and easily book a room with a push of 2 buttons.  Great app!  Great rewards!
reviews.author: Kerry Ferrazza

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: Great app. Easy to use to find and book a room, check your rewards status. I have used it several times to book and haven\'t been disappointed yet.
reviews.author: John Yantzi

reviews.title: Great tool for searching and comparing Choice Hotels
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, and tracks your Choice account info well.

reviews.comment: No issues, works as should
